alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Kenedy Island; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 3:44AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A gusty line of showers will impact portions of southeastern Kenedy, southern Hidalgo, Cameron and Willacy Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 343 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cold front along a line extending from 27 miles east of Kenedy County Wind Farms to 11 miles northwest of Port Mansfield Airport to near Reber Memorial Library to Monte Cristo Elementary School to Garcia Middle School to 6 miles southwest of Los Ebanos. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Pharr, Harlingen, Weslaco, San Juan, San Benito, Alamo, Donna and Mercedes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
